alert.note: Alert for Freestone; Henderson; Limestone; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 7:17PM CST until March 02 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Freestone County in central Texas... Western Henderson County in central Texas... Northern Limestone County in central Texas... Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 815 PM CST. * At 716 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Combine to near Lacy-Lakeview, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Mexia, Gun Barrel City, Teague, Fairfield, Mabank, Malakoff, Tool, Mart, Kerens, Seven Points, Wortham, Eustace, Coolidge, Trinidad, Blooming Grove, Dawson, Angus, Enchanted Oaks and Barry. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 199 and 243. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
